DELL has this issue too?: I can adjust brightness on Windows 7 but no brightness bar.
No, F7 is up and F8 is down.
YES FN+F7 IS brightness up FN+F8 IS DOWN.
How can I file a bug of my case?

if either of the hotkeys you need didnt give anything in showkey, you need to file a kernel bug "ubuntu-bug linux" though testing with the 10.04 beta live cd to see if its already fixed there is recommended
if they are showing with showkey but not xev, look here https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Hotkeys/Troubleshooting
which doent mean its not fixed in 10.04 ;-) it *could* be so its good to test
we established that xev didnt see them
so if showkey did show a code when you clicked the hotkey you want, check out that wiki page for the rest of the "how to report it" info
ok then in the terminal "ubuntu-bug linux" will let you report a kernel bug to launchpad.net
that wiki page will also tell you that ;-)
